thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Murray Johns / 12-Point SignWorks
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Murray Johns / 12-Point SignWorks

author: Murray Johns / 12-Point SignWorks
title: Murray Johns / 12-Point SignWorks
text: I had a great experience with Aaron doing some over the phone troubleshooting with our laser. We were trying to determine whether the power supply or the tube was the issue, and he patiently waited and assisted while I worked around the machine. He even used FaceTime to give me streaming video assistance, and although my older machine was a bit different that the platform he was working on to show me, he answered my many questions and reassured me when I hesitated. It's rare to have a pleasant tech support experience especially when I don't have a full understanding of what I'm working on, so I sincerely appreciated Aaron's friendly assistance.
